comments.body: Not sure if this is well known or not, but I wonder if using `???` here might become a problem one day given: https://github.com/tpolecat/tpolecat.github.io/blame/master/_posts/2014-04-11-scalac-flags.md#L21
@dwijnand yeah I've run into that before as well. If it start causing trouble we can always switch it over to another hack :)
